long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whack a Mouse Offline Version (Only 1MB)

INTRODUCTION
Play Whack a Mouse on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Whack a Mouse extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Whack a Mouse icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Whack a Mouse popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?
Tap to stop the mouse attacking the house
